title: On Identity and Culture: James Lindsay Part 2
description:
Here is the 2nd half of my interview with Jim. I am quite happy with the direction this section takes, I was able to hear Jim's views on cultural identity that I hadn't heard him share before.

Part 1 of Jim's interview: https://youtu.be/DrFkBFVJLLo
Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/On-Identity-and-Culture-James-Lindsay-Part-2-ejv7ja

Find Jim's new book "Cynical Theories" here: 
https://www.amazon.com/Cynical-Theories-Scholarship-Everything-Identity-ebook/dp/B08BGCM5QZ

Follow Jim on Twitter here: @ConceptualJames 

Follow me on Twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me at: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
